Html: How to port this excellent library to Compact.NET?

Hi dbl007,

I have never used Compact.NET so I have no idea what would be involved. I suspect the main sticking point would be whether you can P/Invoke the same APIs. If so, there is a good chance it will port across.


Mark

Hi Mark,

.NET Compact Framework is a .NET environment that supports building and running managed applications on Windows mobile device. I will try to compile NAudio library source on this framework, test it out and report results in this forum.

Hi dbl007

I will be interested to hear how you get on. I used to do Windows CE programming about 10 years ago, but that was before .NET came out

Mark
